title: O'er the Atlantic;
author: W[hyte], W[illiam] E.
snippet: Hall, Heriot, Falahill, Tyneheacl, Gorebridge, Dalahousie, Eskbank, Dalkeith, and soon afterwards  came in sight of the Firth of Forth, arriving  in Edinburgh at 6 p. M.,and were soon seated in the luxurious coffee-room of the " Cockburn Hotel," conducted'like the "Trevelyan" at Manchester,  on the temperance plan, where our wants were promptly supplied, and our comfort duly cared for, by the very accommodating host and hostess.
